description.narrative: The overall project development objective (PDO) is to enhance the business climate for financial institutions and other targeted private sector enterprises in Mauritania. The revised PDO Outcome indicators are: (1) Number of procedures required to establish a business is reduced (2) Percentage of credits reported to the credit registry increases.

title.narrative: Number of procedures required to establish a business is reduced
Number of tax payments per year decreases
Cost to start up a business (as a percent of GNI per capita) decreases
Number of days required to start a business decreases
Percentage of credits reported to the credit registry increases
A one-stop-shop for enterprise creation is established and operational
The commercial registry is computerized and operational
